 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָשַׁשׁ‎</span>] **verb Po\`el** ==beat down, shatter== (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bruise, grind***); — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרשֵׁשׁ‎</span> [[Jer.5.17|Jer 5:17]] one ***shall beat down*** thy fortified cities **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֻשּׁשְׁנוּ‎</span> [[Mal.1.4|Mal 1:4]] ***we are beaten down***.
